TaskDescription: During this task, participants see different pictures with differently coloured frames. They are instructed to respond to the colourful frame with the corresponding button. The task is presented in four blocks and each block is preceded by a short practice. There are four colours for the frame (red, green, blue, yellow) and seven picture categories: erotic couple, erotic woman, erotic man, positive, neutral, neutral couple, tree. Each category contains eight pictures. Every picture is shown eight times (twice with each coloured frame). Pictures-frame-combinations are randomly presented across blocks.
CapManufacturer: ActiCap Slim electrodes in ActiCap Snap holders
HardwareFilters: LowPass with 5th order Butterworth filter at 250 Hz, 30 dB
